requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 (2 * 3600) or equivalent, AMD Ryzen 3550H (4 * 2100) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 640 (2048 MB)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Does not run on pre Ryzen 5 AMD CPUs, intel CPUS (Core i3, 2014) do support the game.

  • Storage: 3 GB available space
